features: POWERED BY MANDELIC ACID - TOur acidified cleansing formula supports skin that smells better longer - it’s the ultimate odor eliminator!
KNOCK OUT EXISTING ODOR & CONTROL ODOR FROM SHOWER TO SHEETS- Lume Acidified Cleansing Bar is clinically proven to remove odor and to control odor for 24 hours after you step out of the shower.

LUXURIOUS LATHER - Through a triple milling process, this high quality cleansing bar has had excess air and water removed, resulting in a dense, long lasting bar with a rich, creamy lather. It's great as a shampoo bar too.

SERIOUSLY SAFE FOR ALL YOUR PARTS - Developed by a gynecologist, Lume Acidified Cleansing Bar was formulated without SLS and SLES, phthalates, and parabens to safely cleanse all your odor prone areas. For outrageously effective odor control, follow with any Lume Whole Body Deodorant.
UNSCENTED - The ideal choice for those who prefer the scent of nothing at all.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Acidified Skin Smells Better Life can leave you feeling less than fresh—especially in odor prone areas. Traditional soap gets you clean, but it raises the pH of your skin—helping odor bloom more quickly. Lume’s cleansing bar puts more power in your shower with an acidified formula that knocks out existing odor while priming your skin to control new odor.

Previous page Works Everywhere Cleanses ALL unwanted odor—think pits, underboob, belly button, vulva, butt crack, feet & more. Works Harder Clinically proven to remove odor better than traditional soap and control odor for 24 hours.* Works Smarter Lume’s innovative acidic formula supports skin that smells better longer. Works Safely Doctor developed and safe for ALL your odor prone areas. Formulated without SLS, SLES and parabens. Next page Not an Ordinary Cleansing Bar! 1 Works Everywhere 2 Works Harder 3 Works Smarter 4 Works Safely

Not Your Ordinary Body Care! Acidified Cleansing Bar Add to Cart Acidified Body Wash See Details Triple Milled Soap Add to Cart Acidified Deodorant Wipes Add to Cart Acidified Body Cream Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.3 out of 5 stars 112 4.5 out of 5 stars 13,033 4.5 out of 5 stars 5,256 4.4 out of 5 stars 20,926 4.5 out of 5 stars 398 Price $19.99$19.99 $27.19$27.19 $29.99$29.99 $21.99$21.99 $30.99$30.99 Whole Body For pits, privates & beyond For pits, privates & beyond Use from face to feet For pits, privates & beyond For arms, butt cheeks & beyond Clinically Proven* 24 hour odor control 24 hour odor control — 24 hour odor control Smooths appearance of bumps Doctor Developed Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Powered By Mandelic Acid Mandelic Acid Sustainably sourced oils Mandelic Acid Mandelic Acid Free From SLS, parabens, phthalates SLS, parabens, phthalates Parabens, phthalates, dyes Aluminum and baking soda Parabens, mineral oil, lanolin Vegan & Cruelty Free Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes

What’s the difference between Lume Triple Milled Soap, Acidified Cleansing Bar & Body Wash? Our soap is long lasting and moisturizing. Our body wash and cleansing bar (same formula in gel or bar form) have an extra benefit in that the low pH provided by Mandelic Acid better knocks out existing odor and helps control new odor for 24 hours. What is the benefit of Acidified Cleansing Bar and Body Wash? Traditional soap gets you clean, but it raises the pH of your skin—helping odor bloom. Our acidified formula has a low pH which helps control odor reactions to keep skin smelling better longer; they are the ultimate odor eliminators! Where can I use Acidified Cleansing Bar? Our cleansing bar was developed by an OB/GYN, but is so much more than a feminine wash. Formulated with skin loving ingredients to safely cleanse ALL your odor prone areas. Makes a great face wash and shampoo bar too. Is Acidified Cleansing Bar Moisturizing? Our cleansing bar is made with skin loving ingredients that moisturize and help skin feel softer.
*2021,2022 & 2023 product efficacy studies conducted by Princeton Consumer Research

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Using as a facial cleanser
reviews.reviewText: EDIT: this product is working perfectly as my everyday facial cleanser. I have no dryness or irritation, my skin is responding to it just as I hoped. I only use it for my face, though with the amount of lather I get on my hands, I can wash my chest too. I use this in the shower after using a separate make up remover. I’m super pleased!!I bought this specifically because I wanted a pH balanced bar soap for my face. I prefer bar soaps because they are less wasteful but I cannot use regular soap on my face, it destroys the acid mantle of my facial skin and I get so flaky and sensitive! I just got this and it feels great. No problems so far, I will update if I start to experience any issues.One problem is I ordered ‘unscented’ and got ‘lavender sage’ instead. I’m using it anyway because the scent is subtle and natural.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and smells good- no bad Lume smell
reviews.reviewText: Finally, a Lume product that doesn’t smell like Pachouli covered poop. I’ve tried various Lume products over the years and they all smelled so bad, that I felt “What's the point ?” But this product smells great, lathers well, and I stay completely clean smelling between showers ( every 24 hours. ) I hesitated to spend $20 on a bar of soap, but its confidence and security in a bar. I’m interested to see how long the bar lasts. I keep it out of the water with a soap magnet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It helps, but the price!
reviews.reviewText: So. I have been a stinky person all my life. Even as a little kid, I remember my parents having to spray me with deodorant spray after my shower because I was stinky. I have always had to use an antibacterial deodorant soap when showering or else I am gross within a couple hours, even with deodorant/antiperspirant deodorant. I could never just use a pretty scented body wash or moisturizing soap without running the risk of smelling bad soon after. I often shower multiple times a day because I just like to be and feel as fresh as I can. I was hoping this soap would work to keep me feeling fresh for a longer duration of time. I have to say, I think it does help. I noticed no irritation or dryness when I used it, and the unscented soap just made me smell clean. I think it did help keep my stank at bay. I would not say my BO was eliminated, but reduced. But I honestly cannot get over the price. My first bar, I used up in like not even 10 days. My second bar, I cut in half because I was trying to make it last longer, but it didn’t last much more that way. I have a hard time with the idea that I’m literally putting $15 in soap down the drain in a little more than a week. I do think it works, but I don’t know if I can adopt it for everyday use at this price… I can get enough trusty, gold antibacterial soap for my entire household for MONTHS for the same price as one bar of this soap. I think this soap does help battle BO, but it sure puts a whoopin on the wallet! Thanks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this bar! It doesn’t dry my skin it’s safe on my personal area👏🏾👍🏾The cost for 1 bar is very high but worth it to stop body odor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s an $18 bar of soap…and it’s small
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love Lume products. Like, love them. And I’ve been using them since they began.I wanted to try this soap…not really sure what I was expecting, but this is a SMALL, soft-milled bar of soap that will set you back almost twenty dollars. I guess I was thinking it would be more for the money (like a Duke Cannon-sized bar).It smells great…and I’m sure it’ll work. But I think it’s going to go very quickly, even with care, and I just cannot rationalize spending this much money on a single piece of soft soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I didn't like the Lavender scent as a Deodorant but as a soap its perfect. Light and fresh. Amazing odor control. Gets sudsy and bubbles up like regular bar soap. Definitely buying again! Ive been using this with the body Deodorant for.about 2 weeks now and haven't had ANY insecure smell issues at all since

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes lots of suds
reviews.reviewText: This soap makes a good lather. It leaves my skin feeling really clean without any residue. I’m using a cloth soap bag which helps the bar to air dry well between uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product can change your life!
reviews.reviewText: Ladies if you’re going through menopause or are done with menopause you will want to try this product. It is unlike any soap you have ever used because it is different. I have sensitive skin down there and this product is gentle as can be plus odor is 100% gone in seconds. I am not exaggerating I highly recommend this product.
